item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, January 29, 2025 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. HSBC to exit parts of investment banking business in UK, US and Europe
2. Musk clashed with Tangen over Norway oil fund’s vote against Tesla pay
3. US chipmaker Nvidia rebounds after historic tumble
4. Why Nvidia investors are spooked by Chinese AI upstart
5. OpenAI’s Altman vows ‘better models’ as China’s DeepSeek disrupts global race
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, January 29, 2025 at 1:10 AM UTC
